games.saloon

Class Cowboy

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.saloon.GameObject
        • games.saloon.Cowboy

  • public class Cowboy
extends GameObject
    A person on the map that can move around and interact within the saloon.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean canMove
      If the Cowboy can be moved this turn via its owner.
      java.lang.String drunkDirection
      The direction this Cowboy is moving while drunk.
      int focus
      How much focus this Cowboy has.
      int health
      How much health this Cowboy currently has.
      boolean isDead
      If this Cowboy is dead and has been removed from the game.
      boolean isDrunk
      If this Cowboy is drunk, and will automatically walk.
      java.lang.String job
      The job that this Cowboy does, and dictates how they fight and interact within the Saloon.
      Player owner
      The Player that owns and can control this Cowboy.
      Tile tile
      The Tile that this Cowboy is located on.
      int tolerance
      How many times this unit has been drunk before taking their siesta and reseting this to 0.
      int turnsBusy
      How many turns this unit has remaining before it is no longer busy and can `act()` or `play()` again.

        gameObjectName, logs

    • Field Detail

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove
        If the Cowboy can be moved this turn via its owner.

      • drunkDirection

        public java.lang.String drunkDirection
        The direction this Cowboy is moving while drunk. Will be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West' when drunk; or '' (empty string) when not drunk.

      • focus

        public int focus
        How much focus this Cowboy has. Different Jobs do different things with their Cowboy's focus.

      • health

        public int health
        How much health this Cowboy currently has.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead
        If this Cowboy is dead and has been removed from the game.

      • isDrunk

        public boolean isDrunk
        If this Cowboy is drunk, and will automatically walk.

      • job

        public java.lang.String job
        The job that this Cowboy does, and dictates how they fight and interact within the Saloon.

      • owner

        public Player owner
        The Player that owns and can control this Cowboy.

      • tile

        public Tile tile
        The Tile that this Cowboy is located on.

      • tolerance

        public int tolerance
        How many times this unit has been drunk before taking their siesta and reseting this to 0.

      • turnsBusy

        public int turnsBusy
        How many turns this unit has remaining before it is no longer busy and can `act()` or `play()` again.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cowboy

        public Cowboy()
        Creates a new instance of a Cowboy. Used during game initialization, do not call directly.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public boolean act(Tile tile)
        Defaults the value for the optional arg 'drunkDirection' to '""'
        See Also:
        act(Tile, String)

      • act

        public boolean act(Tile tile,
          java.lang.String drunkDirection)
        Does their job's action on a Tile.
        Parameters:
        tile - The Tile you want this Cowboy to act on.
        drunkDirection - The direction the bottle will cause drunk cowboys to be in, can be 'North', 'East', 'South', or 'West'.
        Returns:
        True if the act worked, false otherwise.

      • move

        public boolean move(Tile tile)
        Moves this Cowboy from its current Tile to an adjacent Tile.
        Parameters:
        tile - The Tile you want to move this Cowboy to.
        Returns:
        True if the move worked, false otherwise.

      • play

        public boolean play(Furnishing piano)
        Sits down and plays a piano.
        Parameters:
        piano - The Furnishing that is a piano you want to play.
        Returns:
        True if the play worked, false otherwise.
